errors.error_description: The command to run the application references a non-existent entry point file 'main.py'. The correct entry point script is 'pulse'.
correction_candidates: In the same folder, enter the following command in the terminal: `poetry run python pulse`
In the same folder, enter the following command in the terminal: `poetry run python run.py`
In the same folder, enter the following command in the terminal: `poetry run python app.py`
In the same folder, enter the following command in the terminal: `poetry run python pulse.py`
errors.golden_answer: In the same folder, enter the following command in the terminal: `poetry run python pulse`
